title: Do you think the world would unite if there is proof of the existence of another intelligent species? And how would it go? - Quora

response.answer_text: It all depends on the nature of that alien species and how we detect them. In Ursula K Le Guin’s “The Lathe of Heaven”, a psychiatrist would hypnotize a guy whose dreams would become real. Under hypnosis, he would tell the guy what to dream, but the dreams have a “Monkey’s paw” effect. He told him to dream of “Peace on Earth”. That resulted in an alien invasion, which caused all the nations of the world to unite together to fight the invaders. So, aliens invading the earth would unite all of us together, sure.

People of a country A do not remain united just by knowing that people of a neighboring country B are more powerful. People of the country A are likely to get united if people of the neighboring country B attack them and there is a leader to guide them towards unification. The same logic may apply to Earthly human beings versus alien beasts from outside the Earth.
There is proof, and no one wants you to know about it or unite because of it.
